alert.note: Alert for Cuming; Dodge; Stanton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:17AM CDT until July 24 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Cuming County in northeastern Nebraska... Northwestern Dodge County in east central Nebraska... East central Stanton County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 317 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pilger, or 17 miles south of Wayne, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wisner around 325 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Beemer, West Point, Dodge and Snyder. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
